text: Need Matthew Taylor for Lush campaign. Budget around $4,230, looking for 1 x Twitter post, 1 x Facebook post, 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Instagram reel. 7 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $4,230 budget
